title: Did Jesse Jackson like Donald Trump? They once collaborated
shortDescription: President Donald Trump offered his condolences to the family of Rev. Jesse Jackson, who died on Feb. 17. The two men collaborated in the 1990s.

title: A low Trump approval rating but huge war chest as midterms near
shortDescription: Although low inflation and unemployment are both bright spots in the economy, voters aren’t feeling it. That could hurt Republicans in the midterms.

title: Protests planned in SoCal call for Trump impeachment. Where, when
shortDescription: The demonstrations with public addresses are planned in Santa Clara, Los Angeles, Ontario, Corona and Chula Vista. What is happening?

title: 'Personality, grit and street smarts'. Trump says he knew Jesse Jackson well
shortDescription: Trump said a lot of his policy initiatives focusing on Black Americans were inspired by Jackson’s advocacy, such as funding HBCUs.

title: Trump will be 'indirectly' involved in Iran talks
shortDescription: The United States and Iran will begin indirect talks in Geneva as tensions rise between the countries over nuclear weapons.

title: A low Trump approval rating but huge war chest as midterms near | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Although low inflation and unemployment are both bright spots in the economy, voters aren’t feeling it. That could hurt Republicans in the midterms.

title: Will Trump avoid 'MAGA dud' problem with 2026 primary picks?
shortDescription: Trump has long wielded his endorsements as a cudgel to purge the Republican party of those he clashed with, such as former Rep. Liz Cheney.

title: A ruling, a hearing and the fate of Trump's new ballroom
shortDescription: The project has gone through various changes since it was first announced in July including financing, seating capacity and cost of the project.

title: Trump slams Maryland governor over Potomac sewage spill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said his administration will step in to protect the Potomac River, following the collapse of a sewer pipe.

title: Who controls history? Judge overrules Trump decision to remove display
shortDescription: George Washington kept nine enslaved people at President's House in Philadelphia. The Trump administration removed a display honoring them.

title: Trump wants death penalty for Guthrie kidnappers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he wants the death penalty for Nancy Guthrie's kidnappers.

title: Ohio GOP senators won't give away Wexner donations amid Epstein probe
shortDescription: A growing number of Ohio politicians plan to donate campaign contributions from billionaire Les Wexner in lead-up to his testimony about Epstein ties.

title: Republican congressman says he has no confidence in Pam Bondi as AG
shortDescription: In a rare split within the GOP, Congressman Thomas Massie said on ABC's "This Week" that he has no confidence in Pam Bondi as Attorney General.

title: Trump’s MAGA Inc. has a whopping $300 million to spend on midterms
shortDescription: Trump’s super PAC, Maga Inc., has amassed over $300 million since his election, an unprecedented amount that will help Republicans in midterms.

title: White House ballroom renderings briefly posted, then removed
shortDescription: Renderings briefly posted Feb. 13 before being removed reveal the scale of a proposed 89,000-square-foot White House ballroom.

title: Are aliens 'real?' What Congress heard before Obama admission
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama ignited a firestorm when he seemed to admit aliens were “real.” Congress has explored the topic of UAP, UFOs for years.
